articles.title: BNY builds “AI for everyone, everywhere” with OpenAI
articles.summary: BNY Mellon has partnered with OpenAI to develop an "AI for everyone, everywhere" initiative, aiming to make artificial intelligence more accessible and inclusive. This collaboration will enable the bank to leverage OpenAI's technology to drive innovation and improve customer experiences. By doing so, BNY Mellon is poised to revolutionize the financial industry with AI-powered solutions.

articles.title: BBVA and OpenAI collaborate to transform global banking
articles.summary: BBVA has partnered with OpenAI to revolutionize the banking industry, leveraging AI to enhance customer experiences and improve operational efficiency. This collaboration aims to integrate OpenAI's advanced technologies into BBVA's services, driving innovation and transforming the way banking is done globally. The partnership is expected to bring about significant improvements in areas such as customer support, risk management, and financial analysis.

articles.title: How We Used Codex to Ship Sora for Android in 28 Days
articles.summary: The developers of Sora leveraged Codex, a cutting-edge AI-powered coding tool, to rapidly deploy their app on Android in just 28 days. Codex's automated coding capabilities enabled the team to work more efficiently, streamlining the development process and reducing the time-to-market. This achievement demonstrates the potential of AI-driven tools to accelerate mobile app development and innovation.

articles.title: Advancing science and math with GPT-5.2
articles.summary: Researchers have unveiled GPT-5.2, a cutting-edge AI model that promises to revolutionize science and math education by providing personalized learning experiences and automating complex problem-solving tasks. This innovative technology has the potential to make STEM subjects more accessible and engaging for students of all levels. With GPT-5.2, the possibilities for advancing scientific discovery and mathematical understanding have never been more exciting.

articles.title: The Walt Disney Company and OpenAI reach landmark agreement to bring beloved characters to Sora
articles.summary: The Walt Disney Company has partnered with OpenAI to integrate its iconic characters into Sora, a platform that utilizes AI to generate interactive experiences. This landmark agreement will enable fans to engage with Disney characters in new and innovative ways, blurring the lines between entertainment and technology. The collaboration is set to revolutionize the way we interact with beloved characters, offering immersive and dynamic experiences.

articles.title: Deepening our partnership with the UK AI Security Institute
articles.summary: A leading tech company has announced a partnership with the UK AI Security Institute to advance AI security research and development. This collaboration aims to enhance the security and trustworthiness of AI systems, addressing emerging threats and vulnerabilities. The partnership is expected to drive innovation and shape the future of AI security in the UK and beyond.

articles.title: Strengthening our partnership with the UK government to support prosperity and security in the AI era
articles.summary: A major tech company has announced a strengthened partnership with the UK government to drive AI innovation and support national prosperity and security. This collaboration aims to harness AI's potential to boost economic growth, improve public services, and enhance cybersecurity. By working together, the UK government and the tech company seek to establish the country as a leader in the responsible development and deployment of AI technologies.

articles.title: FACTS Benchmark Suite: Systematically evaluating the factuality of large language models
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced the FACTS Benchmark Suite, a comprehensive evaluation tool designed to assess the factuality of large language models. This suite systematically tests the accuracy and reliability of these models, helping to identify areas where they may spread misinformation. By using FACTS, developers can refine their models to provide more trustworthy and accurate information.

articles.title: Engineering more resilient crops for a warming climate
articles.summary: Scientists are developing more resilient crops to withstand the challenges of a warming climate, using advanced engineering techniques to enhance their ability to thrive in extreme temperatures and weather conditions. This innovation aims to improve global food security by creating crops that can adapt to rising temperatures and changing precipitation patterns. By doing so, researchers hope to reduce crop losses and ensure a stable food supply for future generations.

articles.title: AlphaFold: Five years of impact
articles.summary: AlphaFold, a revolutionary AI protein-folding model, has made significant strides in the field of biology over the past five years, accurately predicting the 3D structures of proteins and enabling breakthroughs in disease research and drug development. This innovation has far-reaching implications for our understanding of human health and the development of new treatments. By accelerating protein structure prediction, AlphaFold is transforming the field of biology and paving the way for future medical discoveries.

articles.title: New in llama.cpp: Model Management
articles.summary: The latest update to llama.cpp introduces model management, allowing users to easily switch between different AI models and manage their instances. This innovation enhances flexibility and customization, enabling developers to optimize their applications with the most suitable models. By streamlining model management, llama.cpp improves overall performance and usability for AI-powered projects.

articles.title: Codex is Open Sourcing AI models
articles.summary: Codex, a cutting-edge AI technology, is open-sourcing its models, making it accessible to developers and researchers worldwide. This move is expected to accelerate innovation in the field of artificial intelligence and drive new applications. By open-sourcing its models, Codex aims to foster collaboration and advancement in AI development, potentially leading to breakthroughs in areas like natural language processing and code generation.

articles.title: Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker: Cost-efficient Frontier Multimodal Performance
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker, a cost-efficient AI model that achieves state-of-the-art performance in multimodal tasks, such as text, image, and video processing. This innovation enables more efficient use of computational resources, making multimodal AI applications more accessible and affordable. By reducing costs, Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker has the potential to accelerate the development of AI-powered solutions in various industries.

articles.title: Introducing swift-huggingface: The Complete Swift Client for Hugging Face
articles.summary: The swift-huggingface library provides a complete Swift client for Hugging Face, enabling developers to seamlessly integrate AI models into their iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS apps. This innovation allows for easy access to a vast range of pre-trained models, streamlining the development of AI-powered applications. With swift-huggingface, developers can now leverage Hugging Face's extensive model repository to build more intelligent and interactive user experiences.

articles.title: DeepMath: A lightweight math reasoning Agent with smolagents
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced DeepMath, a cutting-edge math reasoning agent that utilizes smolagents to provide lightweight and efficient problem-solving capabilities. This innovative approach enables DeepMath to tackle complex mathematical problems with improved accuracy and speed. By leveraging smolagents, DeepMath has the potential to revolutionize math education and research with its enhanced reasoning and problem-solving abilities.

articles.title: BpfJailer: eBPF Mandatory Access Control [pdf]
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced BpfJailer, a novel framework that leverages eBPF (extended Berkeley Packet Filter) to implement Mandatory Access Control (MAC) in Linux systems. This innovation enables fine-grained control over system calls and resource access, enhancing security and isolation. By utilizing eBPF, BpfJailer provides a flexible and efficient way to enforce security policies and prevent unauthorized access.

articles.title: Koralm Railway
articles.summary: The Koralm Railway is a high-speed rail line in Austria that features a 32.9km tunnel, making it one of the longest railway tunnels in the world. This innovative project aims to reduce travel time and increase connectivity between major cities in Austria. By utilizing advanced tunneling technology, the Koralm Railway is set to revolutionize transportation in the region.

articles.title: GPT-5.2
articles.summary: Researchers have unveiled GPT-5.2, a significant upgrade to the GPT series, boasting improved language understanding and generation capabilities. This new model is expected to enhance various AI applications, including chatbots, language translation, and content creation. With its advanced features, GPT-5.2 has the potential to revolutionize the way we interact with artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Show HN: Tripwire: A new anti evil maid defense
articles.summary: Tripwire is a new open-source defense mechanism designed to prevent "evil maid" attacks, where an attacker gains physical access to a device and installs malware. This innovative solution aims to detect and prevent such attacks by monitoring a device's boot process and alerting users to potential tampering. By providing an additional layer of security, Tripwire helps protect sensitive data and devices from physical compromise.

articles.title: Guarding My Git Forge Against AI Scrapers
articles.summary: A developer is taking measures to protect their Git Forge repository from AI-powered scrapers that are exploiting open-source code. To combat this, they're implementing rate limiting, IP blocking, and other security measures to prevent unauthorized access. This effort highlights the growing concern of AI-powered code scraping and the need for developers to secure their open-source projects.

articles.title: CRISPR fungus: Protein-packed, sustainable, and tastes like meat
articles.summary: Scientists have engineered a CRISPR fungus that produces high amounts of protein, offering a sustainable alternative to traditional livestock farming. This innovative fungus has a meat-like taste and texture, making it a promising option for plant-based meat substitutes. By leveraging CRISPR technology, this breakthrough could revolutionize the food industry with a more environmentally friendly and efficient protein source.

articles.title: Training LLMs for Honesty via Confessions
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced a novel approach to training Large Language Models (LLMs) to be more honest by using "confessions" - a technique where the model is encouraged to admit when it's unsure or doesn't know the answer. This method has shown promising results in reducing the spread of misinformation and improving the overall trustworthiness of LLMs. By promoting honesty and transparency, this innovation has the potential to significantly enhance the reliability of AI-generated content.
